Common.Item: select pb.bldfullname+(case when room.unit<>'' then '-'+room.unit+'-'+room.room else +'-'+room.room end ) as roominfo, sc.OriginalTotalDj as 原底价总价, sc.OriginalPriceDj as 原底价建筑单价, sc.OriginalTnPriceDj as 原底价套内单价, sc.OriginalTotal as 原标准总价, sc.OriginalPrice as 原建筑单价, sc.OriginalTnPrice as 原套内单价, sc.originalbldarea as 原建筑面积, sc.ScBldArea as 现建筑面积, sc.originaltnarea as 原套内面积, sc.sctnarea as 现套内面积, sc.originalareastatus as originalareastatus, sc.areastatus as 现面积状态, sc.RoomGUID, sc.ScAreaChangeGUID, --用于搜索的字段 pb.bldfullname, pb.ProjGUID, --用于排序的字段 pb.bldguid, room.unit, room.floorno, room.no, --开始计算的sql sc.NewTotalDj as 现底价总价, sc.NewPriceDj as 现底价建筑单价, sc.NewTnPriceDj as 现底价套内单价, sc.NewTotal as 现标准总价, sc.NewPrice as 现建筑单价, sc.NewTnPrice as 现套内单价, pentity.InitiateDatetime as 发起时间, pentity.FinishDatetime as 审核通过时间, pentity.ProcessGUID from dbo.s_scareachange sc left join dbo.p_room room on room.roomguid = sc.roomguid left join dbo.p_building pb on pb.bldguid = room.bldguid left join dbo.myWorkflowProcessEntity pentity on sc.BusinessGUID = pentity.BusinessGUID left join ( select (select case paramvalue when '元' then 0 when '角' then 1 else 2 end from dbo.mybizparamoption where paramname='s_pricezero' and scopeguid='502962F9-D3DE-E211-9180-005056992512') as pricepre, (select case paramvalue when '元' then 0 when '角' then 1 else 2 end from dbo.mybizparamoption where paramname='s_totalzero' and scopeguid='502962F9-D3DE-E211-9180-005056992512') as totalpre ) as baolw on 10=10 where sc.status='审核中'
